CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local jegiPath = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/Jegi/Jegi") jegiPath.RigidbodyComponent.Enable = false ScoreComponent.score = 0
local HideEatSongpyeonUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/EatSongpyeonUI") HideEatSongpyeonUI:SetEnable(false)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleFootholdEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity local Foothold = event.Foothold -------------------------------------------------------- local PopupLoseUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/LoseUI") PopupLoseUI:SetEnable(true) local HideJegiUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/JegiUI") HideJegiUI:SetEnable(false) local jegiPath = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/Jegi/Jegi") jegiPath.RigidbodyComponent.Enable = false

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity --------------------------------------------------------
ScoreComponent.score = ScoreComponent.score + 1
if ScoreComponent.score == 3 then local PopupWinUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/WinUI") PopupWinUI:SetEnable(true) local HideJegiUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/JegiUI") HideJegiUI:SetEnable(false)
_ScoreData.minigameWins = _ScoreData.minigameWins + 1 _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/점수판 UI/UIText_2").TextComponent.Text = tostring(math.floor(_ScoreData.yutWins * 2 + _ScoreData.minigameWins)) local jegiPath = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/Jegi/Jegi") --jegiPath.TransformComponent.Position.y = -1.5 end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleEntityMapChangedEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local NewMap = event.NewMap local OldMap = event.OldMap local Entity = event.Entity --------------------------------------------------------
if NewMap.Name == "Jegi" then local jegiPath = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/Jegi/Jegi") jegiPath.RigidbodyComponent.Enable = false ScoreComponent.score = 0 end
if OldMap.Name == "Jegi" then local HideJegiUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/JegiUI") HideJegiUI:SetEnable(false) local HideJegiClickUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/JegiClickUI") HideJegiClickUI:SetEnable(false) end
if OldMap.Name == "mainmap" then local HideEatSongpyeonUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/EatSongpyeonUI") HideEatSongpyeonUI:SetEnable(false) end
